posts.content:
Awesome news for anyone who isn't already aware

Tony Chamberlain has very kindly offered the world famous Hippy Split soap box racer for the Sunday night auction at this years AGM at Viccy farm

Get ready everyone , and dig deep for you chance to own this world famous red bull racer

As i said, the auction will be held on the Sunday night in the barn for you all to bid in person - If anyone isn't able to attend but would like the opportunity to bid, please feel free to contact me direct to bid on your behalf


(OK - so i know forum rules dictate a price - but i'm sure you will all accept giving the circumstances, for this post, a price isn't appropriate…..but let's say £10 starting bid
It's velvet green as well
